items.question: Will the Glow app slow down my Shopify store's loading speed?
items.answer: Not at all. Glow is engineered with "Liquid-first" principles and loads asynchronously, ensuring your store maintains a perfect Google Lighthouse score while your customers enjoy a seamless experience.

items.question: Do my customers need to download a separate app to join?
items.answer: Never. Glow eliminates friction by allowing customers to add their digital membership cards directly to their native Apple or Google Wallet with one tap. No downloads, no clutter.

items.question: Is it easy to migrate my data from Smile.io or Yotpo?
items.answer: Yes. We offer a "Clean Slate" import tool that allows you to migrate your existing customer points and data to Glow in seconds, giving your loyalty program a more beautiful home.

items.question: Can I customize the design for my specific artisan niche?
items.answer: Absolutely. Whether you create handmade ceramics or digital brushes, Glow's UI is a canvas. You have full control over hex colors, icons, and typography to ensure it matches your brand's unique vibe.

items.title: Core Technology: BIP39 & AES-256-GCM
items.description: Afterglow's foundation is built upon the BIP39 Mnemonic standard, the same protocol used by leading cryptocurrency wallets. The system generates a 24-word "Recovery Kit" to protect your Master Password backup. Every piece of data is encrypted using AES-256-GCM, providing the highest level of cryptographic security available for commercial use.

items.title: Physical-Digital Bridge: Powered by ShipAny
items.description: We have bridged the gap between digital data and physical heirlooms through deep integration with ShipAny, a global logistics orchestration platform. Automated Triggers: Real-time monitoring via high-performance Edge Functions. Human-in-the-Loop (HITL): To prevent irreversible shipping errors, every Pro-tier physical dispatch requires manual secondary authorization from the Afterglow administrative dashboard. Privacy-First Logistics: Beneficiary shipping addresses remain encrypted in our database and are only decrypted at the moment the shipping label is generated.

items.title: Why Upgrade to Pro Family Plan?
items.description: For users managing high-value assetsâ€”such as private keys, sensitive legal documents, or priceless family archivesâ€”the Pro Plan offers "Certainty of Delivery": Omni-channel Alerts: Avoid single-point-of-failure risks associated with email-only notifications. Logistics Settlement Engine: Integrated Creem gateway allows beneficiaries to settle shipping fees with a single click. Unlimited Beneficiaries: Perfect for complex estate planning and family trust structures.

items.title: Legal Disclaimer & Best Practices
items.description: While Afterglow provides state-of-the-art technical security, we strongly recommend that users print their Recovery Kit and store it in a secure, fireproof location. Our service serves as a technological supplement to your estate plan and does not replace a legally binding will or testament as defined by your local jurisdiction. Please consult with a legal professional for comprehensive estate planning.
